title: German TV-Series Logo
author: misterhonk

comments.content: A mix of Lucas de Groot [TheSans Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317070110/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/thesans_mono) ('In ALLER') and [TheSerif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317070110/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/theserif) ('freund schaft').
